item.title: Recommendations: Things
item.description: Having great things can meaningfully increase the quality of your life. However, in general, msot people aren’t intentional about finding things that make day to day life better, don’t take inventory of the things that they benefit from the most, and recommend specific products that work well to others. I encourage you to do this exercise for yourself. You may grow a deeper appreciation for things in your life that truly make your days better, and can easily share them with others.
